attr.title: Spring Hell
attr.desc: Just Press Spacebar at the right time! Itâ€™s very simple arcade game with tiny puzzle and platformer.
attr.inst:
This game is available on itch.io AND Steam. Please use the Steam version as that has been tested and is confirmed to work. The itch.io version has NOT been tested but will likely work as well. If you happen to already have it on itch.io and you can confirm that it works, please alert me in the discord.
Otherwise, download the game from Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2585490/SpringHell/
Once it's downloaded and installed to your library, right click it and select 'Manage' then 'Browse Local Files'. COPY the 'SpringHell.pck' file into the gamedata folder and launch the game!
